document_data.name: Gauntlet
document_data.mainbody: '''Gauntlet''' was a [[battle horror]] (an evolved kind of [[helmed horror]]) that led the [[Doom Brigade]] under orders of the [[beholder]] [[Vaxall]].{{Cite dungeon/69/Sleep of Ages|75}}
document_data.Relationships: Gauntlet was one of the main minions of Vaxall. It led the [[Doom Brigade]], a company of ten helmed horrors.
document_data.History: In [[1370 DR]], Gauntlet and his troop tried to stop the awakening of the [[Knights of the Crescent Moon]], considering them a threat for its master.
document_data.Possessions: Gauntlet possessed a ''[[helm of telepathy]]'' that permitted it to give orders to the helmed horrors and was equipped with [[Guardian (magic sword)|Guardian]], a magic sword enchanted by the [[lich]] [[Jhaniloth Puiral]].
